correctness.rationale: Several key fields are correct and traceable (PEALD method; precursors DADI/TMGa/DEZ; use of Ar/O2 plasma; deposition temperature 200 °C; plasma power 300 W; pressure ≈1.2 Torr; 20 nm channel thickness; device structure and representative device metrics). However, many entries are unsupported, incorrect, or unit-mismatched: (1) Co-reactant should be Ar/O2 plasma, not just O2 plasma; carrierGas and purgingGas = Ar are not stated in the article. (2) Growth-per-cycle values (0.29/0.25/0.28 Å) are not reported and appear confused with lattice spacings (0.29 and 0.28 nm from TEM); numberofCycles=100 and nucleationPeriod=10 are not given. (3) DosingTime units are wrong: article gives 1.5 s (DADI) and 0.1 s (TMGa/DEZ); the JSON uses MilliSEC with the same numeric values (off by 10^3) and adds unreported co-reactant/purge times. (4) Flow rates (sccm) are not provided. (5) SupercycleDesign (1,1,1) is arbitrary; n1/n2/n3 vary by composition and are not specified for the reported optimal sample. (6) Optical/electrical film properties are largely fabricated: refractive index, absorption coefficient, resistivity, mobility, and specific carrier density values are not reported; band gap = 3.2 eV corresponds to sputtered IGZO, whereas PEALD 1:1:1 is stated to be higher. (7) FilmComposition is incorrect: “1:1:1” and a single 33.3% value are not supported; XPS Table S1 shows varying In:Ga:Zn ratios. (8) Crystallinity is not universally amorphous; it depends on composition (amorphous in Ga-rich, ZnO(100) in Zn-rich, cubic In2O3 in In-rich). (9) Roughness is not reported; filmDensity=6.0 g/cm3 does not match XRR values (≈5.4–6.95 g/cm3 depending on sample). (10) DeviceProperties: μFE=43.7 cm2/Vs and Vth=−1.1 V match the text, but SS is entered as 0.25 mV (unit in schema is MilliV); it should correspond to 0.25 V/dec ≈ 250 mV. To improve: correct co-reactant to Ar/O2 plasma; remove or justify carrier/purge gases; fix dosing-time units; omit unreported flow/nucleation/GPC/roughness/uniformity/conformality values; provide actual XPS composition (Table S1) and appropriate crystallinity for the chosen sample; set band gap consistent with the reported composition; correct SS to 250 mV and use the matching on/off ratio for the same device sample.

completeness.rationale: Largely incomplete and inconsistently grounded in the article, with several schema misuses. Key issues: 1) Multiple processes missing: the article reports many IGZO compositions (tie-lines L1 and L2; numerous IGZO_In_#, IGZO_Ga_#, IGZO_Zn_#). Only one process instance is extracted; supercycle subcycle counts (n1, n2, n3) controlling composition are not captured per sample. 2) Reactants misreported: co-reactant should be Ar/O2 plasma (article), not O2 plasma. Carrier/purge gas types are not explicitly reported in the article; setting both to Ar is ungrounded. 3) Timing and units wrong/untraceable: precursor dose times are given in seconds (DADI 1.5 s, TMGa 0.1 s, DEZ 0.1 s) but recorded as 1.5, 0.1, 0.1 with MilliSEC units (off by 10^3–10^4). Co-reactant dose and purge times are fabricated (not reported). 4) Thickness control fabricated: growth-per-cycle values (0.29/0.28/0.25 Å) are not reported; likely confused with lattice spacings (0.29 nm) and are untraceable. Total cycles (100) are not given in the article. 5) Supercycle design incorrect: numberofSubcycles set to 1:1:1 contradicts the study where n1, n2, n3 vary to achieve diverse compositions. 6) Material properties largely ungrounded or incorrect: refractive index, absorption coefficient, uniformity (5%), conformality (AR 10), roughness (1 nm), and film density (6.0 g/cm3) are not supported by the text; densities reported for representative samples differ (e.g., 5.40–6.95 g/cm3). Crystallinity marked amorphous conflicts with composition-dependent phases (amorphous only Ga-rich; Zn-rich and In-rich show crystalline peaks). 7) Composition misrepresented: elemental concentration set to 33.3% and atomic ratio 1:1:1; the paper provides detailed XPS values (Table S1) across many compositions, and the optimal region is not 1:1:1. 8) Electrical properties (film-level) incorrect/untraceable: carrier density unit used is C-PER-M3; article reports carrier concentration (cm^-3) trends but not specific 1e19 value; resistivity not given. 9) Device properties partially correct but unit/schema misuse: μ_FE 43.7 cm2/Vs, Vth -1.1 V, SS 0.25 V/dec are reported; however, SS is stored with MilliV units and value 0.25, which equals 0.25 mV (should be 250 mV to represent 0.25 V). 10) Substrate details incomplete: films deposited on Si(100) and soda-lime glass; TFTs on SiO2(100 nm)/p++Si; extraction records only SiO2/Si. To improve: extract separate process instances for each composition (or at least per tie-line), correct co-reactant to Ar/O2 plasma, fix dosing units (convert seconds to milliseconds), remove fabricated purge/flow/GPC values or replace with grounded values, provide accurate supercycle subcycle counts (n1, n2, n3) for each process, populate film composition and density from Table S1 and XRR, set crystallinity per composition (XRD/TEM), correct SS units, and include actual substrates used.
